data.text: We want to emphasize that this approved petition is not tantamount to class suspension. However, Deans have strengthened their directive that students must be allowed to watch and enjoy the UNC Palaro 2k18 as a celebration of athletic skills and an avenue to cultivate camaraderie

VPAA Maniquiz is currently composing an official reply of the UNC Administration to our submitted petition, which will be released before Lunch Break. We will post such memo later. 

You can already inform your professors about this announcement.
This was the result of her meeting with all College Deans and AVPSAS Dr. Armin Fullante and DSA Kim Francia Bigay, aimed to address the nine-page petition The DEMOCRAT submitted early this morning.
